name: DarcAstra
savepath: Initial release of DarcAstra, sadly rushed due to time constraints (my apologies). I shall add the remaining changes in a future update. Thank you for playing my mod, feel free to make any changes that you desire!

1.00b - Fixed a UI bug that prevented players from assigning stat points in D2R graphics, added some default configs for chat color, sunder value, etc. See the Patch Notes.md file in the topmost DarcAstra folder for the 1.00 changelog.
